info.name: Firefox/userchrome - Move Persona down
info.description: Moves FireFox's personas down so the picture is visible, but the top is still transparent! Recommended for Win7 or Win8 with Glass8. Tested with Pale Moon on Windows 8. Other variants and OSes may need tweaking. Thanks to http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=23&t=2114171&p=10464719 for the code!
